entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.0 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
